post.body: Yeah, I pretty much to do. My followers/following are pretty well balanced.
I follow just about everyone who follows me, unless I don't have anything in common with them or they are spammers
@MissMotorMouth I too am interested in others, learning about them, reading their blogs and learning what I can from my followers
Yes it is!!!
YW! Hope you reach your goal!!!
absolutely!!!
Awesome. I love helping fellow twitterers make new friends!
Coool!!!!
Sweet! Just follow others with similar interests and usually they follow you back.
How many do you have? I'll RT you too!
Thanks!
Thanks! that was informative!
A couple of tweeps have told me its twitter cleaning out spammers...which is good!!!
Yeah, I was thinking it was something like that! Ooooh! I get to join Breakthrough today!!! Yea!!!
My shopping is DONE! Hallelujah! Just waiting for some to arrive in the mail. Then must wrap. I also have to food shop still. You?
reading devo's in email, got several blog posts to write and some reviews to do, plus need to upgrade Wordpress blogs to 2.7!
Good as well! Up early, got lots to get done today!! I'm blessed to WAH too!!! It's not too bad here, yet but supposed to get lot ...
It sure does!!! And makes it feel much happier!!
It totally counts! We have ppl that have lights for Valentines and Easter, 4th of July and Halloween!
LOL. Nah! When I see ppl leave theirs up after NY's I think they LOVE Christmas and wish mine were still up!
We take ours down a little after the New Year. They're usually up Thanksgiving weekend.
I don't like to turn ours off either! They are too pretty and we only get to have them up for a little while!
'tis is!!! Exactly what I'm going to do! For a bit anyway. Then I may do some Photoshop tutorials!!!
LOL. no no. I wonder if there's others out there too! Probably probably
Yes they certainly are! I don't have ADHD and I don't always get it at first either! LOL
LOL. I love reading ur and @inworship 's tweets! So funny!
Sure am!!! Love them and their stuff! Ur right, they are so smart! Proud to be associated with them
I'll have him email you some. LOL. Wont' that be the day when technology is that far advanced!!!
yes it does! I didn't think of that. His baby is a baby boy soooo. But He could call Alyssa sister for sure!
guess what he called her, Sut-SUH, so we still call her Suhsuh to this day
my great grandson called his first baby doll *yes he had one* Sut-SUH and we don't know why. My great niece was born, Aly ...
I think its time to hit the sack! I'm tired and headachy! G'nite!
Retweeting @chrisbrogan: Best post ever: http://tinyurl.com/6hre2d
Check out my new background! http://marylutz.com. Follow my blog if you wish!
Thanks to all my new followers! I exceeded my goal of 600 followers by midnight tonight by 10!!! You all RAWK!!!! Thanks to those who RT'd 2
Blog post just edited: Holiday Giveaways http://cli.gs/9UaL1r
check out giveaway 3 for mom by @MomMaven http://mommaven.blogspot.com"
my twitter updates are not updating in facebook either ;(
Retweeting @cindyoohlala: Would really like 30 more new followers tonight - any takers? I really am fun to know...
Retweeting @FahimFarook: @marylutz I only want a 100 followers by Monday :D But I'm following @daNanner as per your tweet :)
WP #2 upgraded successfully! ! more to go! Wooohooo!
Just successfuly upgraded one blog to WP 2.7, 2 more to go!
Published a new post: Efficient Web Tools: Say the Time http://cli.gs/PUZ4sz
New Post: Review: Apples to Apples Game http://www.efficientwahm.com/?p=210
RT @DeborahWoehr:Read this Twitter announcement. http://tinyurl.com/4bx4ok One of my followers lost 200 this morning out of the blue.
I need a camera!!! I want to take Christmas pics and I can't!!! I'm sad :(
Wow. I lost 40 followers. Hmmmm?
Retweeting @deafmom: Need some motivation? Follow @motivation to juice up your day!
RT @Positive_Thinkr: Never forget the three powerful resources you always have available to you: love, prayer, and forgiveness.H. Jackso ...
Updating my myspace profile, and adding music. What a fun, lazy thing to do this New Year's day!
Hubby is off to work, DS is skiing and DD is hanging out in her rm. prob. talking to BF. I'm just hanging out, checking email and reader
Heading to my DD's for New Years game night! Fun fun fun!!! Happy New Year!!!
